productDetailsList.name: Learn to Write: Toddlers Educational Games

description.coverLine: Preschool and Kindergarten kids learn to write and trace standing/sleeping lines, shapes, ABC, Number, Spanish, Hindi Alphabets. Kids also learn the phonetics of English Alphabets while writing. Let kids learn how to write in a fun and interactive way all while they enjoy playing.

features.title: Features
list: Lines and curves
Basic shapes
Capital English Letters
Small case English Letters
Numbers
Spanish Alphabet
Hindi Varnamala

paragraphs: The app helps enhance hand-eye coordination of toddlers and helps them to learn to draw lines, curves and some basic shapes so that they can be introduced to the concept of writing without overwhelming them. Every kid can learn at their own pace all while having fun. This app is meant for kids of age right from 3 years to 6 years and also helps them to improve their handwriting.

Pedagogy of the app is specially designed and engineered to teach kids how to write. After extensive feedback from various teachers and institutions that specialize in the same domain, we have come up with this app. It starts with the very basics and goes to complex forms very gradually. Here, the kid begins by understanding how to draw standing, sleeping and slanting lines. Slowly the kid proceeds to more complex shapes like curves, circles, square, etc. at his/her own pace, all while enjoying the experience facilitated by fun-filled animations and guidelines. Once, the kid has mastered the basics, he/she can move to alphabets, the small case as well as the capital case, numbers and even cursive writing.

The app not only provides English but also Spanish and Hindi letters. The app is packed with lots of audio-visual effects to keep children interested and engaged during the process. Pre-schoolers will quickly and intuitively pick up the shapes, alphabet, and numbers and build memory retention skills while enjoying the interactivity and sound effects associated with each activity.
gamesList: Lines and Curves: Slanting lines, vertical lines, curved lines etc.
Shapes Tracing: Curve, heart, triangles, square, rectangle, pentagon, hexagon, octagon, semi circle, star etc.

paragraphs: If You looking for free learning games so your child can have fun and learn math at the same time? look no beyond then “Learn Math Educational Games for Toddlers and Kids”. It’s a free education app designed for all ages including kids, girls and boys of age range between 2 to 5 years. This learn math app feature number of education games which teaches your kids multiplication and division games with Addition and Subtraction games all in one app in a fun and learning way.

Learning basic math concepts at early age is good and an important part of every child’s education. Books are always best way to teach kids math, but in this age of smart devices well-designed leaning educational apps and games is also a good leaning tool for kids. Learning math is fun for Preschoolers, kindergartners, toddlers, and older kids with our kids educational app and funny cool math games for kids. With help of these fun games kids can learn math concepts like counting, addition, subtraction, sorting, comparison, place values, times and clocks and more.

paragraphs: The first app in our English learning series, designed especially for young kids (2-4 age group), to lay the groundwork for learning basic skills with the help of fun activities. 10 high quality activities at a single place, each focusing on a key precept of elementary English. Funny and enticing rewards keep our young learner amused for hours while introducing them to the language. The unique interactive activities are perfect for preschoolers to help them learn the language in a structured way. The activities also help build their hand-eye coordination, motor skills and concentration.

The activities do not force timed completion, and therefore encourage the kid to learn at his/her own pace. Kids are enchanted with the experience of the game as there is no winning and no losing. Appreciation and stars can be earned at the end of each activity. Adorable stickers can be collected after scoring enough points.

description.coverLine: Jigsaw puzzle games is an awesome adventure to Caribbean island to hunt hidden gold treasure with Captain Hawk & his merry band of Pirates.Join beautiful jigsaw puzzle pieces in your quest to gold.Challenges of bombs and mines on the way makes journey adventurous.

features.title: Features
list: Story based progression
TChallenges of time, score and number of attempts
Increasing complexity
64 Challenging puzzles
Attractive aesthetics

paragraphs: It’ is a family-friendly jigsaw puzzle game that caters to a wide age group of audience.It lets you relive your fantasy of being a pirate, sailing in the high seas to a Treasure Island.

So, buckle yourself for the voyage of a lifetime with the daring Captain Hawk and his merry band of pirates as they embark on a quest to find hidden treasures. On this voyage, you will encounter several intriguing jigsaw puzzles with increasing levels of complexity. You will have to brave your way past a gigantic octopus, humble tribes of nomads and a cheerful dragon before you can eventually lay claim to the greatest treasure of ‘em all! With 64 puzzles waiting to be unlocked, gear up for an exciting experience. You are in for hours and hours of guaranteed fun!
